subject: Re: Ghost Box Success Rate / Response to FS post
author: Country
full_text:
Tim:

I, too, saw the "guess my line" (i.e. guess the secret object) experiment on the ITC web site as well and also thought of someone else who used to be on this group. I suspect he may possibly have gotten that idea from this web site?

In any case, I did find this article on the ITC web site discrediting or debunking or whatever the proper term is for EVP's via radio sweep. Perhaps this is what you are referring to?

http://atransc.org/journal/radiosweep_study.htm

Cheers,
CB

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Tim Woolworth <tjwoolworth@...> wrote:
I read on the Butlers ATC site a few months back that they had a grouptesting the boxes and they would post their findings soon.  Are these the results that the Butler's came up with from this test, or are these results from an early experiment?  I just went to their site and couldn't find mention of it, but right on their homepage there was this: 
> "Everyone is invited to use EVPmaker to name the secret object." 
> Sounds familiar, huh?  I wonder if RJ is part of their group. 
> Tim
